item.title: Economic Commentary on Infrastructure: U.S. Proposal, Global Gap, Digital Divide
item.description: Infrastructure merits more investment, everywhere; we look at the specifics of the U.S. proposal.
item.content:encoded: Infrastructure merits more investment, everywhere; we look at the specifics of the U.S. proposal.

item.title: Investment Strategy Brief: Infrastructure Plan
item.description: The $2 trillion proposed U.S. infrastructure plan — which will be challenging to get through Congress — would impact materials, energy, technology, industrials and healthcare companies.
item.content:encoded: The $2 trillion proposed U.S. infrastructure plan — which will be challenging to get through Congress — would impact materials, energy, technology, industrials and healthcare companies.

item.title: Gaining Traction
item.description: The Northern Trust Economics team shares its outlook for the U.S. economy.

item.title: Trapped
item.description: Our Chief Economist, Carl R. Tannenbaum, discusses central banks endeavors to restore economic activity and the liquidity trap.
item.content:encoded: Our Chief Economist, Carl R. Tannenbaum, discusses central banks endeavors to restore economic activity and the liquidity trap.

item.title: A Note on Securing High-Priority Goals
item.description: Securing high-priority goals requires a goal-aligned portfolio that has adequate liquidity, sufficient inflation protection and similar average maturity (or duration) to that of planned goals.
item.content:encoded: Securing high-priority goals requires a goal-aligned portfolio that has adequate liquidity, sufficient inflation protection and similar average maturity (or duration) to that of planned goals.

item.title: Economic Commentary: Digital Currencies, Mortgage Forbearance, Pets
item.description: Central banks will go digital, and homeowners avoided foreclosure.
item.content:encoded: Central banks will go digital, and homeowners avoided foreclosure.

item.title: Steve David: Celebrating a New Career Milestone
item.description: Steve David reflects on his career journey after assuming the role of Chief Executive Officer of Northern Trust’s Luxembourg-headquartered bank, Northern Trust Global Services SE earlier this year. This is in addition to his responsibilities as Country Head of Northern Trust’s Luxembourg Global Fund Services Business.
item.content:encoded: Steve David reflects on his career journey after assuming the role of Chief Executive Officer of Northern Trust’s Luxembourg-headquartered bank, Northern Trust Global Services SE earlier this year. This is in addition to his responsibilities as Country Head of Northern Trust’s Luxembourg Global Fund Services Business.
